= Synopsis = 
Uses Delft3D (2DH) and 1D models UNIBEST-CL+ and LONGMOR to model the evolution of mega-nourishments. They are calibrated with data from the [[sand_motor|Sand Motor]] and present relationships between length and width for a large range of these values for mega nourishments.

= Conclusions =
"The life time of nourishments is mainly determined by the dimensions of the nourishment and incoming wave energy. (p.51)"
